short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically fills and submits Shopify password pages for development preview stores.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simply provide the store password via query parameter. The extension supports either ?password= or simply ?p= params. The login prompt will be automatically filled and access to the preview store granted.

You can also checkout https://directify.me for an alternative solution.
